comment: it's so sad to see this professors rate so low, I have taken professor lantigua for two semesters now, and everything has been chill. Classwork is nice independent work. She gives demos almost every class to help set you up plus provides PowerPoints for even MORE help. Easy homework 1 a week. TAKE HER YOU WILL HAVE PEACE OF MIND WHILE DRAWING ;3

RMP has her name wrong, it's Lantigua. She's a new professor and a very nice person so I cut her some slack, but this class wasn't great. Most class periods we just worked with no engaging feedback or critique (at that point why am I coming into class when I could work at home?) However, she graded very pretty fairly in my experience.

I was frustrated with this class. I wouldn't mind the mandatory attendance if the class was worthwhile. she doesn't teach and the projects are repetitive but my main problem was CRITIQUE. We had to attend class but we sat there on our computers and wrote in a discussion post. Don't take if you actually want to learn anything because I didn't.

Attendance is mandatory even though you don't do anything in the class except your projects which you can easily do at home, plus she doesn't even make an effort to teach. She's nice but she's not good as a professor in my opinion. I wouldn't recommend.

The projects she gives out will take you an entire week to do and she has no concept that her students have their own lives (and struggles that they go through). I'll give her the benefit of the doubt that she is a new teacher, but STILL. She doesn't teach and expects you to know what to do. Her last name is actually Lantigua btw RMP is wrong.

Be prepared to not make an A in this class. She is a harsh grader and includes any practices you did beforehand. If you take her be prepared to put 100% effort into every assignment. Also what she says and presents to the class is often not even the project, and her explanations are confusing. I would pay close mind to the project rubrics online.
